channel.title: Tradeoffs on Mike Brave
channel.description: Recent content in Tradeoffs on Mike Brave

item.title: Best in What Way, For Who, When?
item.description: Every Choice is a Tradeoff Everything is a tradeoff, always. The longer I live the more evident this is true. I used to be and still sometimes struggle with being a perfectionist, I like to weigh all the options, see every possibility before committing to a decision, sometimes even going back over it again and rethinking the decision, this has never served me well. “A good plan, violently executed now, is better than a perfect plan next week” — George Patton
